Articles.Content:
Here is a unique and interesting problem, my Whiplash engine is ~1.5m. I've confirmed it is not stock, but I can't seem to pin down which mod would be cause such a strange occurrence. I'm really not using anything that should be changing engines at all. Any ideas?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ip5e6jaiv9cb8kd/output_log.txt?dl=0
OK, I went through and did the whole process of elimination and the culprit was RealPlume (which hasn't been updated yet)
Funny, it used to scale the Whiplashes down so they were too small. I'm guessing that the fix for that enlarges the new models.
How the heck is RealPlume modifying part sizes? It's an FX mod!
See the fix mentioned here, NK: [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/129119-1-0-4-RealPlume-Stock-Configs-v0-8-1-2015-281?p=2127281&viewfull=1#post2127281[/url]

[quote name='NathanKell']How the heck is RealPlume modifying part sizes? It's an FX mod![/QUOTE]

My thoughts exactly. That's why I had a hard time finding it, 80% of my mods are visual effects and I kept telling myself "Surely it isn't RealPlume". I think the only thing I suspected less was Crowd Sourced Science rofl.
